text: ai eemaanavaalon jab tum momina auraton se (bagair mehar muqarrar kiye) nikaah karo usake baad unhen apane haath lagaane se pahale hee talaaq de do to phir tumako unapar koee haq nahin ki (unase) idda poora karao unako to kuchh (kapade roopaye vagairah) dekar unavaane shaista se rookhasat kar do
